verses.name: Joel 3:14
verses.text: Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision: for the day of the Lord is near in the valley of decision.

verses.name: Joel 3:15
verses.text: The sun and the moon shall be darkened, and the stars shall withdraw their shining.

verses.name: Joel 3:16
verses.text: The Lord also shall roar out of Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but the Lord will be the hope of his people, and the strength of the children of Israel.
